rules_text:
[i]Evade[/i] – {1}{U}{B}: Target creature you control gains intimidate until end of turn. [i](This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]
[i]Whisper[/i] – Whenever a Rogue or Assassin you control deals combat damage to a player, that creature connives.
